mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBSCRIPTION (USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS, START_DATE, END_DATE, CANCEL_REASON, CANCEL_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{subscriptionStatus}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cancelReason}, #{cancelDate})
mapper.select: SELECT S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID, S.USER_ID, S.PRODUCT_ID, S.SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.CANCEL_REASON, S.CANCEL_DATE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.IMAGE, P.PRICE, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM SUBSCRIPTION S JOIN PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = #{subscriptionId}

SELECT S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID, S.USER_ID, S.PRODUCT_ID, S.SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.CANCEL_REASON, S.CANCEL_DATE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.IMAGE, P.PRICE, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM SUBSCRIPTION S JOIN PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE SUBSCRIPTION SET SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS = #{subscriptionStatus}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, CANCEL_REASON = #{cancelReason}, CANCEL_DATE = #{cancelDate} WHERE SUBSCRIPTION_ID = #{subscriptionId}
